entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:29 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:44 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.0°C
Pressure: 101.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.1°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
